\documentclass[main.tex]{subfiles}


\begin{document}


\begin{titlepage}


\begin{center}

% Title.
\huge
\textbf{SEISMIC-RNA Developer Manual}
\normalsize

\vspace{0.5cm}

% Version of software (import and print using Python).
\Large
\begin{python}
import seismicrna
print(f"Version {seismicrna.__version__}")
\end{python}
\normalsize

\vspace{0.25cm}

% Date of typesetting (YYYY-MM-DD).
\Large
\begin{python}
from datetime import datetime
now = datetime.now()
# Format the date manually (avoiding datetime.strftime) because
# datetime.strftime uses percent symbols, which begin comments in LaTeX.
print(f"{now.year:0>4d}-{now.month:0>2d}-{now.day:0>2d}")
\end{python}
\normalsize

\end{center}

\vspace{2cm}

% Logo.
\begin{figure}[h]
    \includegraphics[width=\textwidth, center]{../../../logo/logo-1440.png}
\end{figure}


\end{titlepage}
